prompts: Create a powerful Normal-type Pokemon with a strong presence and unique horn structures.
Show me a Pokemon that resembles a buffalo, featuring a massive head and thick fur.
Imagine a Pokemon that embodies the spirit of the wild, with striking horns and a sturdy body.
Design a Pokemon that roams the grasslands, showcasing impressive strength and resilience.
Generate a creature that has both defensive and offensive capabilities, suited for close combat.
Give me a unique Pokemon with a mix of wildness and calmness, perfect for a nature-loving trainer.
Make a Pokemon that can be both a protector and an agile fighter in the wild.
